description:
BitCardTour is a global financial asset payment platform jointly launched by the world's second largest credit card international organization, MasterCard International and Singapore's Bitcard Tour financial institutions.

BitCardTour uses the blockchain technology and the MasterCard payment system to create a global financial payment system for cross-border, trade, consumption, payment, seamless exchange of currency, wealth management, finance and other integrated digital currency.
name: BitCardTour
